title: Database Schema Design
description: Create detailed database schema with tables, columns, constraints, and relationships for user management.

phases.title: Core User Tables Schema Design
phases.description: Design the main users table structure with all essential columns, data types, and basic constraints.
deliverables: Users table schema with columns (id, email, username, password_hash, created_at, updated_at)
Not null constraints for required fields
Unique constraints for email and username

phases.title: User Profile & Status Tables Schema Design
phases.description: Design supporting tables for user profiles and status history with proper relationships.
deliverables: User_profiles table schema with personal information fields
User_status_history table schema for tracking status changes
Foreign key relationships to users table
